      Returns a set of waiting travelers, sorted by departure times.

      This creates a list of travelers from the demand file.

      void SAVSimulator.addTravelerToTaxi(Taxi taxi, Traveler person)
      This adds the traveler to the taxi, and should be called by the Dispatch to handle all simulator updates associated with a traveler entering a taxi.
      int Traveler.compareTo(Traveler rhs)
      Orders travelers according to departure time, then id.
      void SAVOrigin.removeTraveler(Traveler person)
      Removes a traveler from the list of waiting travelers.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
